name: Great Helm
short_description: Full coverage helmet worn on the head, completely encases head and face with eye slits

name: Barbuta
short_description: Open-faced helmet worn on the head with distinctive T-shaped opening for eyes and breathing

name: Sallet
short_description: Light helmet worn on the head with extended back protection and optional visor

name: Bascinet
short_description: Pointed helmet worn on the head, evolved from skull cap with extended neck protection

name: Spangenhelm
short_description: Segmented helmet worn on the head with metal framework and leather or metal plates

name: Nasal Helmet
short_description: Helmet worn on the head featuring prominent nose guard for facial protection

name: Morion
short_description: Open helmet worn on the head with distinctive crest and brim, popular with infantry

name: Corinthian Helmet
short_description: Ancient-style full-face helmet worn on the head with distinctive eye and mouth openings

name: Kettle Hat
short_description: Wide-brimmed iron helmet worn on the head, provides rain protection and basic defense

name: Skull Cap
short_description: Simple bowl-shaped helmet worn on the head, covers top of skull only

name: Horned Helmet
short_description: Fantasy helmet worn on the head decorated with horn projections, intimidating appearance

name: Crown
short_description: Ornate headpiece worn on the head, symbol of royal authority and status

name: Circlet
short_description: Simple metal band worn on the forehead, lightweight alternative to crown

name: Coif
short_description: Mail hood worn on the head and neck, protects head while allowing flexibility

name: Breastplate
short_description: Metal chest armor worn on the torso, protects vital organs from frontal attacks

name: Cuirass
short_description: Full torso armor worn on chest and back, consists of breast and back plates

name: Hauberk
short_description: Long mail shirt worn on the torso, extends to knees or mid-thigh

name: Byrnie
short_description: Short mail shirt worn on the torso, lighter alternative to hauberk

name: Gambeson
short_description: Padded cloth armor worn on the torso, quilted layers provide surprising protection

name: Brigandine
short_description: Flexible armor worn on the torso with small metal plates riveted inside fabric

name: Coat of Plates
short_description: Early plate armor worn on the torso, metal plates sewn inside cloth covering

name: Scale Mail
short_description: Armor worn on the torso made of overlapping metal scales attached to backing

name: Lamellar
short_description: Armor worn on the torso of small rectangular plates laced together in rows

name: Studded Leather
short_description: Leather armor worn on the torso reinforced with metal studs or rivets

name: Chain Mail
short_description: Flexible armor worn on the torso made of interlocking metal rings

name: Leather Armor
short_description: Hardened leather protection worn on the torso, lightweight but limited defense

name: Robe
short_description: Long flowing garment worn on the body, often favored by spellcasters and scholars

name: Tunic
short_description: Simple shirt-like garment worn on the torso, basic clothing for most classes

name: Vest
short_description: Sleeveless garment worn over shirts on the torso, provides extra layer of protection

name: Doublet
short_description: Fitted jacket worn on the torso, fashionable garment for nobles and merchants

name: Jerkin
short_description: Sleeveless jacket worn on the torso, practical garment for working folk

name: Tabard
short_description: Sleeveless overgarment worn on the torso, displays heraldry or guild symbols

name: Gauntlets
short_description: Armored gloves worn on the hands, protect fingers and knuckles in combat

name: Bracers
short_description: Armor plates worn on the forearms, protect from elbow to wrist

name: Vambraces
short_description: Forearm guards worn on the arms, lightweight protection for archers and fighters

name: Rerebraces
short_description: Upper arm armor worn from shoulder to elbow, protects bicep area

name: Pauldrons
short_description: Shoulder armor worn on the shoulders, large plates protecting shoulder joint

name: Spaulders
short_description: Small shoulder guards worn on the shoulders, lighter than pauldrons

name: Couters
short_description: Elbow protection worn at the elbow joint, articulated for movement

name: Besagews
short_description: Circular plates worn at the armpit, protect vulnerable joint areas

name: Leather Gloves
short_description: Soft gloves worn on the hands, provide basic protection and grip

name: Mittens
short_description: Fingerless gloves worn on the hands, keep hands warm while maintaining dexterity

name: Greaves
short_description: Shin guards worn on the lower legs, protect from knee to ankle

name: Sabatons
short_description: Articulated foot armor worn on the feet, metal shoes for full protection

name: Chausses
short_description: Mail leggings worn on the legs, flexible leg protection from hip to ankle

name: Schynbalds
short_description: Shin armor worn on the lower legs, simpler alternative to full greaves

name: Poleyns
short_description: Knee guards worn at the knee joint, protect kneecap from strikes

name: Cuisses
short_description: Thigh armor worn on the upper legs, protect from hip to knee

name: Tassets
short_description: Hip protection worn around the waist, hanging plates protecting upper thighs

name: Faulds
short_description: Waist armor worn around the hips, horizontal plates protecting lower torso

name: Ring
short_description: Circular band worn on the finger, may bear gemstones or engravings

name: Necklace
short_description: Chain or cord worn around the neck, often holds pendants or charms

name: Pendant
short_description: Ornamental piece worn hanging from a necklace on the chest

name: Earrings
short_description: Decorative jewelry worn attached to or through the earlobes

name: Bracelet
short_description: Ornamental band worn around the wrist, may be chain or solid band

name: Anklet
short_description: Decorative band worn around the ankle, lightweight jewelry for the foot

name: Brooch
short_description: Decorative pin worn on clothing, often used to fasten cloaks or robes

name: Fibula
short_description: Ancient-style safety pin worn on clothing, functional and decorative

name: Torc
short_description: Rigid neck ring worn around the throat, symbol of status in Celtic cultures

name: Armband
short_description: Metal band worn around the upper arm, display of strength or status

name: Hair Pin
short_description: Decorative pin worn in the hair, keeps hair in place while adding ornamentation

name: Diadem
short_description: Ornate headband worn across the forehead, marks nobility or achievement

name: Signet Ring
short_description: Ring worn on the finger bearing family crest or seal for marking documents

name: Locket
short_description: Small hinged pendant worn on the chest, opens to hold miniatures or mementos

name: Leather Boots
short_description: Sturdy boots worn on the feet, protect from rough terrain and weather

name: Riding Boots
short_description: High boots worn on the feet, designed for horseback riding with heel and cuff

name: Combat Boots
short_description: Reinforced boots worn on the feet, extra protection for warriors and soldiers

name: Soft Boots
short_description: Flexible boots worn on the feet, allow quiet movement for stealth

name: Sandals
short_description: Open footwear worn on the feet, strapped sole suitable for warm climates

name: Shoes
short_description: Basic footwear worn on the feet, simple leather protection for daily wear

name: Moccasins
short_description: Soft leather shoes worn on the feet, comfortable and quiet for forest travel

name: Sabots
short_description: Wooden shoes worn on the feet, sturdy footwear for peasants and workers

name: Poulaines
short_description: Pointed-toe shoes worn on the feet, fashionable footwear showing status

name: Slippers
short_description: Light indoor shoes worn on the feet, comfortable for rest and relaxation

name: Cloak
short_description: Long outer garment worn over the shoulders, provides warmth and weather protection

name: Cape
short_description: Short cloak worn over the shoulders, lighter protection with dramatic flair

name: Robe
short_description: Long loose garment worn on the body, full coverage clothing often for mages

name: Dress
short_description: One-piece garment worn on the body, covers torso and legs in single piece

name: Skirt
short_description: Lower body garment worn around the waist, covers legs while allowing arm freedom

name: Trousers
short_description: Leg covering worn on the lower body, practical garment covering each leg separately

name: Breeches
short_description: Knee-length trousers worn on the lower body, often worn with hose or boots

name: Hose
short_description: Leg covering worn on the lower body, medieval equivalent of stockings

name: Chemise
short_description: Undergarment worn next to the skin, provides base layer beneath other clothing

name: Surcoat
short_description: Sleeveless overgarment worn over armor, displays heraldry and reduces glare

name: Cowl
short_description: Hooded garment worn over the head, provides anonymity and weather protection

name: Mantle
short_description: Ceremonial cloak worn over the shoulders, symbol of authority and rank

name: Shawl
short_description: Rectangular cloth worn over the shoulders, lightweight covering for warmth

name: Scarf
short_description: Long strip of cloth worn around the neck, provides warmth and style

name: Gloves
short_description: Hand covering worn on the hands, protects from cold and provides better grip

name: Hat
short_description: Head covering worn on the head, protects from sun and rain while showing style

name: Belt
short_description: Strap worn around the waist, holds up clothing and carries equipment

name: Baldric
short_description: Diagonal belt worn across the torso, carries sword or other large items

name: Sash
short_description: Decorative band worn around the waist or over the shoulder, shows rank or allegiance

name: Pouch
short_description: Small bag worn on the belt, carries coins and small personal items

name: Purse
short_description: Money container worn on the belt or carried in hand, specifically for coins

name: Satchel
short_description: Shoulder bag worn across the body, carries books, supplies, and equipment

name: Backpack
short_description: Large bag worn on the back, carries extensive supplies for long journeys

name: Quiver
short_description: Arrow container worn on the back or hip, holds ammunition for archery

name: Scabbard
short_description: Sword sheath worn on the belt or back, protects blade and allows quick draw

name: Shield
short_description: Protective barrier held in the off-hand, deflects attacks and provides cover

name: Buckler
short_description: Small round shield worn on the arm, lightweight protection for dueling

name: Heater Shield
short_description: Medium triangular shield held in hand, classic knightly protection

name: Kite Shield
short_description: Large teardrop shield held in hand, provides extensive body coverage

name: Targe
short_description: Small round shield worn on the arm, traditional Highland warrior protection

name: Pavise
short_description: Large rectangular shield planted in ground, mobile cover for crossbowmen

name: Lantern
short_description: Light source carried in hand, provides illumination with protected flame

name: Torch
short_description: Burning stick held in hand, simple but effective portable light source

name: Rope
short_description: Coiled cord carried on belt or in pack, essential for climbing and binding

name: Blanket
short_description: Cloth covering carried in pack, provides warmth and comfort when resting

name: Bedroll
short_description: Portable sleeping gear carried on back, complete camping setup in one bundle

name: Gorget
short_description: Neck armor worn around the throat, protects vulnerable neck area from strikes

name: Aventail
short_description: Mail neck guard worn attached to helmet, protects neck while allowing head movement

name: Standard
short_description: Mail collar worn around the neck, standalone neck protection without helmet

name: Plackart
short_description: Lower chest plate worn on the torso, reinforces breastplate at vital areas

name: Frog
short_description: Leather loop worn on the belt, holds sword or dagger securely while allowing quick draw

name: Bracer
short_description: Archer's arm guard worn on the bow arm, protects from bowstring snap

name: Finger Guard
short_description: Archer's glove worn on drawing fingers, protects from bowstring cuts

name: Thumb Ring
short_description: Archer's ring worn on the thumb, assists with drawing and releasing arrows

name: Spurs
short_description: Metal wheels worn on the heels, used to urge horse forward while riding

name: Stirrups
short_description: Foot rests hanging from saddle, provide stability and leverage while mounted

name: Wrist Guards
short_description: Protective bands worn around the wrists, prevent injury from weapon impacts

name: Shin Guards
short_description: Protective plates worn on the shins, lighter alternative to full greaves

name: Knee Pads
short_description: Cushioned protection worn over the knees, prevent injury during crawling or kneeling

name: Elbow Pads
short_description: Protective cushions worn at the elbows, prevent scrapes and impacts

name: Gorget Plates
short_description: Overlapping throat armor worn around the neck, articulated protection for flexibility

name: Mage Hood
short_description: Enchanted hood worn over the head, channels magical energy and provides mystical protection

name: Wizard Hat
short_description: Pointed hat worn on the head, traditional headwear for practitioners of magic

name: Elven Cloak
short_description: Lightweight cloak worn over the shoulders, provides camouflage and weather resistance

name: Dwarven Mail
short_description: Heavy chainmail worn on the torso, crafted with superior dwarven metalworking techniques

name: Dragon Scale Armor
short_description: Exotic armor worn on the torso, made from actual dragon scales with fire resistance

name: Orc Hide Armor
short_description: Crude leather armor worn on the torso, intimidating appearance with natural toughness

name: Thieves' Gloves
short_description: Fingerless gloves worn on the hands, enhance dexterity for lockpicking and sleight of hand

name: Assassin's Cloak
short_description: Dark hooded cloak worn over the body, aids concealment and silent movement

name: Paladin's Surcoat
short_description: Holy surcoat worn over armor, displays sacred symbols and divine allegiance

name: Barbarian Furs
short_description: Animal pelts worn over the shoulders, provide warmth and intimidating tribal appearance

name: Ranger's Cloak
short_description: Camouflaged cloak worn over the body, blends with natural environments

name: Monk's Robes
short_description: Simple robes worn on the body, allow free movement for martial arts and meditation

name: Bard's Costume
short_description: Colorful outfit worn on the body, designed to catch attention and aid performance

name: Noble's Doublet
short_description: Expensive jacket worn on the torso, displays wealth and social status

name: Peasant's Garb
short_description: Simple clothing worn on the body, practical work clothes for common folk

name: Component Pouch
short_description: Special pouch worn on the belt, holds spell components and magical reagents

name: Holy Symbol
short_description: Sacred pendant worn around the neck, channels divine power for clerics

name: Arcane Focus
short_description: Magical item held in hand, helps channel and focus arcane energies

name: Spell Component
short_description: Material component held in hand, required for casting certain spells

name: Prayer Beads
short_description: String of beads worn around the wrist, aids in meditation and prayer

name: Amulet
short_description: Protective charm worn around the neck, wards against evil or misfortune

name: Talisman
short_description: Magical charm worn on the body, brings good luck or special abilities

name: Medallion
short_description: Large pendant worn on the chest, often displays guild membership or achievement

name: Badge
short_description: Small emblem worn on clothing, shows rank, allegiance, or accomplishment

name: Insignia
short_description: Symbolic ornament worn on uniform, indicates military rank or unit

name: Crest
short_description: Heraldic symbol worn on clothing, displays family lineage or noble house

name: Seal
short_description: Authoritative stamp worn as ring, used to mark official documents

name: Sigil
short_description: Magical symbol worn as pendant, contains power or identifies the wearer

name: Token
short_description: Small memento worn on the body, reminder of important person or event

name: Charm
short_description: Small trinket worn on bracelet or necklace, believed to bring luck or protection
